reviews.review_msg: Ester is the coolest language prof around.  She explains carefully what u need to get ahead in her course and marks fairly.  she expects you to learn something and here "tareas" are not hard if you study and did well in previous spanish courses.  I LOVE ESTER TEJEDA!!!
Ester works very hard and cares for all of her students.  She makes sure that you need to learn something to pass her courses, even (especially) if you already speak spanish.
Super nice lady who cares about her students and takes the time to encourage them. I loved the class!! But she is demanding with the work load.
She is demanding, but you will learn so much.  I love Ester!
